name: World Pro Tennis '98
overview: World Pro Tennis '98 is a tennis game with these game modes: - Exhibition: Quick singles or doubles Match (up to four human players can play at the same time) - World Tour: Compete in different tournaments around the world and try to become the number 1. - Training: Practice your strokes before start the world tour mode. This mode features a tutorial, a wall mode, auto tennis (receive balls from a automatic machine) and service modes. The game features: - 4 difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, Hard & Pro Level. - 32 Different players in the World Tour Mode. - Different kind of surfaces, replays & camera angles.
